channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Watson Machine Learning on Cloud Pak for Data
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Watson Machine Learning on Cloud Pak for Data

item.title: CVE-2023-30444|2024-08-02T14:21:44.903Z -- ibm -- watson%20machine%20learning%20on%20cloud%20pak%20for%20data
item.description: IBM Watson Machine Learning on Cloud Pak for Data 4.0 and 4.5 is vulnerable to server-side request forgery (SSRF). This may allow an authenticated attacker to send unauthorized requests from the system, potentially leading to network enumeration or facilitating other attacks. IBM X-Force ID: 253350.
